Package order.management

Interface IManagement

  • public interface IManagement

    Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
    Politécnico do Porto (PP)
    Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
    Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
    Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
    2019 / 2020

    Contract representing orders management behaviour.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean add​(IOrder order)
      Adds a new IOrder to the order manager

      Returns a copy of the collection of all orders.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        boolean add​(IOrder order)
     throws OrderException
        Adds a new IOrder to the order manager
        Parameters:
        order - order to be added
        Returns:
        1. true if the order is inserted.
        2. false if the order already exists in the container
        Throws:
        OrderException - if order is null

      • remove

        boolean remove​(IOrder order)
        throws OrderException
        Removes an IOrder from the order manager
        Parameters:
        order - order to be removed
        Returns:
        1. true if the order is removed.
        2. false if the order doesn't exists
        Throws:
        OrderException - if: the parameter is null

      • getOrders

        IOrder[] getOrders​(ICustomer customer)
        Returns a copy of the collection of orders from a customer reference
        Parameters:
        customer - to filter orders
        Returns:
        orders set that belongs to the customer

      • getOrders

        IOrder[] getOrders()
        Returns a copy of the collection of all orders.
        Returns:
        all orders
